title: Don’t Make Stupid Decisions When You’re Desperate (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

Taking a better-paying job after you just got hired,

Borrowing money for a house downpayment,

Life insurance options,

Liquidating investments to buy into crypto,

How to quit rationalizing foolish spending.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

Grip6
